issues.title: Implement user authentication
issues.body:
## Overview
Implement secure user authentication for the application.

## Business Value
Provides secure access control and user management capabilities.

## Prerequisites
- Database schema updated
- OAuth provider configured

## Acceptance Criteria
- User can log in with email and password
- User can log in with OAuth (Google, GitHub)
- Session management is secure
- Password reset functionality works

issues.title: Add dark mode support
issues.body:
## Summary
Add dark mode theme support to improve user experience.

## Why
Many users prefer dark mode for reduced eye strain.

## Done Criteria
- Theme toggle button in settings
- All pages support dark mode
- User preference is saved

issues.title: Fix pagination bug
issues.body: Pagination is not working correctly on the users list page. When clicking page 2, it shows page 1 content.

issues.title: Document API endpoints
issues.body:
## Description
Create comprehensive API documentation.

## How To
1. List all endpoints with examples
2. Document request/response formats
3. Add authentication requirements

## Related
- #1 (authentication)
- API specification document

## Custom Section
This is a custom section that should be appended to description.
